refnamediv.refpurpose: Save a set of previously-allocated tables to a file.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Save a set of previously-allocated tables to a file.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: "filename" -- A quoted string containing the name of the file to save.
iflag -- Type of the file to save. (0 = binary file, Non-zero = text file)
ifn1, ifn2, ... -- Numbers of tables to save.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: ftsave saves a list of tables to a file. The file's format can be binary or text.

warning.title: Warning
warning.para: The file's format is not compatible with a WAV-file and is not endian-safe.
